Abi Skincare Hyaluronic Acid Serum

Brand: Abi

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: WATER, GLYCERIN, TREHALOSE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIETHANOLAMINE, PANTHENOL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, HYALURONIC ACID, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: C
Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
